channel.title: Crown
channel.description: How would i make it so mods have a golden crown next to thier name im nerw but i have a good server. if its a code please post it.

item.title: Crown
item.dc:creator: @hero322 hero322
item.description:
@hero322 wrote:

search for a file called “characters” then find your character

so for me (i would go on Character Folder > Hero322) hero322 or whatever your account name is what your looking for

if you search for “Rights” you will find something like

Rights = 0

change it to

1 = mod
2 = admin

have fun =D

Read full topic
